list_definition.definition: a Christian clergyman in charge of a group of churches, usually in a large city or area

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was made a bishop two years ago.

list_definition.definition: one of the pieces in chess

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The bishop moves diagonally across the board.
